messages.selectProject: Select a project to view worktrees

worktrees.title: Worktrees
worktrees.subtitle: Manage isolated workspaces for your Auto Claude tasks

emptyState.title: No Worktrees
emptyState.description: Worktrees are created automatically when Auto Claude builds features. You can also create terminal worktrees from the Agent Terminals tab.

merge.title: Merge Worktree
merge.description: Merge changes from this worktree into the base branch.

delete.title: Delete Worktree?
delete.description: This will permanently delete the worktree and all uncommitted changes.

deleteTerminal.title: Delete Terminal Worktree?
deleteTerminal.description: This will permanently delete the worktree and its branch. Any uncommitted changes will be lost.

errors.taskNotFound: Task not found for this worktree
